nodes.bodyText: I can see the reasoning (it's a summary showing any failures) but it's not necessarily a failure. Could we call it StageSummary or ExecutionSummary or something similar?
See your point, going with VmExecutionLogSummary
I thought we had a requirement that it live in the top-level?

nodes.bodyText: don't think so, when the run succeeds this is where the logs go.
